site.title: Valorant
site.description: Explore all Valorant agents in a neon glassmorphism UI with parallax, rain, and custom cursor effects.

characters.name: Brimstone
characters.description: Joining from the USA, Brimstone's orbital arsenal ensures his squad always has the advantage. His ability to deliver utility precisely and from a distance makes him the unmatched boots-on-the-ground commander.

abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that detonates into a lingering fire zone.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.description: Toss down a stim beacon that creates a field granting players RapidFire.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.description: Use your map to call in smoke clouds that block vision.

abilities.name: [X] Orbital Strike
abilities.description: Launch a lingering orbital strike laser at a selected location, dealing high damage over time to players caught in the area.

characters.name: Viper
characters.description: The American chemist, Viper deploys an array of poisonous chemical devices to control the battlefield and cripple the enemy's vision. If the toxins don't kill her prey, her mind games surely will.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.description: Launch a canister that shatters into a pool of damaging acid.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: Deploy a gas emitter that can be reactivated for a toxic cloud at the cost of fuel.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.description: Deploy a long line of gas emitters that can be reactivated to create a tall wall of toxic gas at the cost of fuel.

abilities.name: [X] Viper's Pit
abilities.description: Emit a massive toxic cloud in a large area that highlights enemies and lasts as long as Viper stays inside the cloud.

characters.name: Omen
characters.description: A phantom of a memory, Omen hunts in the shadows. He renders enemies blind, teleports across the field, then lets paranoia take hold as his foe scrambles to figure out where he might strike next.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.description: Teleport to a marked location to reposition unpredictably.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Send out a shade that nearsights and deafens enemies it touches.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.description: Cast out a stealth orb that bursts into a large, long-lasting shadow sphere.

abilities.name: [X] From the Shadows
abilities.description: Select anywhere on the map to teleport and reform. When arriving, appear as a Shade that can be destroyed by an enemy to cancel your teleport.

characters.name: Killjoy
characters.description: The genius of Germany. Killjoy secures the battlefield with ease using her arsenal of inventions. If the damage from her gear doesn't stop her enemies, her robots' debuff will help make short work of them.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.description: Throw a covert grenade. Activate the Nanoswarm to deploy a damaging swarm of nanobots.

abilities.name: Alarmbot
abilities.description: Deploy a bot that hunts down enemies in range, exploding and applying the Vulnerable effect.

abilities.name: Turret
abilities.description: Deploy a turret that fires at enemies in a 180-degree cone.

abilities.name: [X] Lockdown
abilities.description: Deploy a device that, after a long windup, detains all enemies caught in the radius, slowing them and preventing them from using weapons or abilities.

characters.name: Cypher
characters.description: The Moroccan information broker, Cypher is a one-man surveillance network who keeps tabs on the enemy's every move. No secret is safe. No maneuver goes unseen. Cypher is always watching.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.description: Place a destructible and covert tripwire that tethers, reveals, and dazes enemies who cross it.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.description: Toss a cyber cage that creates a zone that blocks vision and makes a sound when enemies pass through.

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.description: Place a remote camera. Re-use this ability to take control of the camera view and fire a marking dart.

abilities.name: [X] Neural Theft
abilities.description: Extract information from a dead enemy, revealing the location of all living enemy players.

characters.name: Sova
characters.description: Born from the eternal winter of Russia's tundra, Sova tracks, finds, and eliminates enemies with ruthless efficiency and precision. His custom bow and incredible scouting abilities ensure that even if you run, you cannot hide.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.description: Fire an explosive bolt that emits a damaging pulse of static energy upon impact.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.description: Fire a bolt that deploys a sonar emitter, tagging and revealing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.description: Deploy a pilotable drone that can fire a dart that will reveal enemies.

abilities.name: [X] Hunter's Fury
abilities.description: Fire up to three deadly energy blasts that spear across the entire map. Each hit deals heavy damage and marks the target.

characters.name: Sage
characters.description: The bastion of China, Sage creates safety for herself and her team wherever she goes. Able to revive fallen friends and stave off aggressive pushes, she provides a calm center to a hellish fight.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.description: Cast out a radianite orb that breaks into a slowing field upon impact with the ground.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.description: Heal an ally or yourself to full health over a few seconds.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.description: Conjure a large, solid wall that can be fortified.

abilities.name: [X] Resurrection
abilities.description: Target a friendly corpse. After a short delay, revive them with full health.

characters.name: Phoenix
characters.description: Hailing from the U.K., Phoenix's star power shines through in his fighting style, igniting the battlefield with flash and flare. Whether he's got backup or not, he'll rush into a fight on his own terms.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Conjure a flame wall that obscures vision, damages enemies, and heals you.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.description: Throw a flare orb that curves and blinds opponents.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.description: Create a fire zone that damages enemies and heals you.

abilities.name: [X] Run it Back
abilities.description: Mark your location. If you die during this ability’s duration, or when this ability’s duration expires, you’ll be reborn at the marked location with full health.

characters.name: Jett
characters.description: Representing her home country of South Korea, Jett's agile and evasive fighting style lets her take risks no one else can. She runs circles around every skirmish, cutting enemies up before they even know what hit them.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: Instantly throw a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: Instantly propel Jett high into the air.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Instantly propel Jett in the direction she is moving.

abilities.name: [X] Blade Storm
abilities.description: Arm yourself with several deadly throwing knives that deal moderate damage and kill on headshots. A kill restores all daggers.

characters.name: Reyna
characters.description: Forged in the heart of Mexico, Reyna dominates single combat, popping off with each kill she scores. Her capability is only limited by her raw skill, making her highly dependent on performance.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.description: Send out an ethereal, destructible eye. The eye will nearsight all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Instantly consume a nearby soul orb, rapidly healing. Health gained exceeding 100 will decay over time.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.description: Instantly consume a nearby soul orb, becoming intangible for a short duration. If Empress is active, also become invisible.

abilities.name: [X] Empress
abilities.description: Enter a frenzy, increasing firing, equip, and reload speed dramatically. Scoring a kill renews the duration.

characters.name: Raze
characters.description: Raze explodes out of Brazil with her big personality and big guns. With her blunt-force-trauma style of play, she excels at flushing entrenched enemies and clearing tight spaces with a generous dose of 'boom.'

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.description: Deploy a bot that locks onto enemies in its frontal cone and chases them, exploding for heavy damage if it reaches them.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.description: Instantly throw a Blast Pack that will stick to surfaces. Re-use the ability to detonate, damaging and moving anything hit.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.description: Equip a cluster grenade. Fire to throw the grenade, which deals damage and creates sub-munitions, each dealing damage to anyone in their range.

abilities.name: [X] Showstopper
abilities.description: Equip a rocket launcher. Fire shoots a rocket that does massive area damage on contact with anything.

characters.name: Breach
characters.description: Breach, the bionic Swede, fires powerful, targeted kinetic blasts to aggressively clear a path through enemy ground. The damage and disruption he inflicts ensures no fight is ever fair.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Fire a fusion charge to set a slow-acting burst through a wall, dealing heavy damage to anyone caught in its area.

abilities.name: Flashpoint
abilities.description: Fire a blinding charge through a wall that flashes to blind all players looking at it.

abilities.name: Fault Line
abilities.description: Equip a seismic blast. Hold Fire to increase the distance. Release to set off a quake, dazing all players in its zone.

abilities.name: [X] Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Fire a cascading quake through all terrain in a large cone. The quake dazes and knocks up anyone caught in it.

characters.name: Skye
characters.description: Hailing from Australia, Skye and her band of beasts trail-blaze the way through hostile territory. With her creations hampering the enemy, and her power to heal others, the team is strongest and safest by Skye's side.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Equip a healing trinket to channel, healing allies in range and line of sight. Can be reused until her healing pool is depleted.

abilities.name: Trailblazer
abilities.description: Send out and take control of a Tasmanian tiger predator. Fire to leap forward, exploding in a concussive blast and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Guiding Light
abilities.description: Equip a hawk trinket. Fire to send it forward. Hold fire to guide the hawk in the direction of your crosshair and re-use to transform it into a flash.

abilities.name: [X] Seekers
abilities.description: Send out three Seekers to track down the three closest enemies. If a Seeker reaches its target, it nearsights them.

characters.name: Yoru
characters.description: Japanese native Yoru rips holes straight through reality to infiltrate enemy lines unseen. Using deception and aggression in equal measure, he gets the drop on each target before they know where to look.

abilities.name: Fakeout
abilities.description: Equip an echo that mimics footsteps when activated. Fire to send the echo forward, or Alt-Fire to place it in place. Use to activate the echo.

abilities.name: Blindside
abilities.description: Throw an unstable dimensional fragment that, upon hitting a hard surface, winds up and flashes.

abilities.name: Gatecrash
abilities.description: Harness a rift tether. Fire to send it forward. Alt-Fire to place a stationary tether. Activate to teleport to the tether's location.

abilities.name: [X] Dimensional Drift
abilities.description: Equip a mask that can see between dimensions. Fire to drift into Yoru's dimension, unable to be affected or seen by enemies from the outside.

characters.name: Astra
characters.description: Ghanaian Agent Astra harnesses the energies of the cosmos to reshape battlefields to her whim. With full command of her astral form and a talent for deep strategic foresight, she's always eons ahead of her enemy's next move.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Place Stars in Astral Form. Activate a Star to form a Gravity Well, pulling players toward the center before it explodes.

abilities.name: Nova Pulse
abilities.description: Activate a Star to detonate a Nova Pulse, concussing all players in its area.

abilities.name: Nebula / Dissipate
abilities.description: Activate a Star to transform it into a Nebula (smoke). Use F on a Star to Dissipate it, returning it to be placed in a new location.

abilities.name: [X] Astral Form / Cosmic Divide
abilities.description: Activate to enter Astral Form where you can place Stars. When Cosmic Divide is charged, use it to form a massive wall that blocks bullets and heavily dampens audio.

characters.name: KAY/O
characters.description: KAY/O is a machine of war built for a single purpose: neutralizing radiants. His power to suppress enemy abilities cripples his opponents' capacity to fight back, securing him and his allies the ultimate edge.

abilities.name: FRAG/ment
abilities.description: Throw an explosive fragment that sticks to the floor and explodes multiple times, dealing near lethal damage at the center.

abilities.name: FLASH/drive
abilities.description: Throw a flash grenade that explodes after a short fuse, blinding anyone in line of sight.

abilities.name: ZERO/point
abilities.description: Throw a suppression blade that sticks to the first surface it hits, winds up, and suppresses anyone in the radius of the explosion.

abilities.name: [X] NULL/cmd
abilities.description: Overload with polarized radianite energy that empowers KAY/O and causes large energy pulses to emit from his location. Enemies hit with these pulses are suppressed for a short duration.

characters.name: Chamber
characters.tagline: You want to play? Let's play.
characters.description: Well-dressed and well-armed, French weapons designer Chamber expels aggressors with deadly precision. He leverages his custom arsenal to hold the line and pick off enemies from afar, with a contingency built for every plan.

abilities.name: Trademark
abilities.description: Place a trap that scans for enemies. When a visible enemy comes in range, the trap creates a lingering field that slows players caught inside.

abilities.name: Headhunter
abilities.description: Activate to equip a heavy pistol with a custom scope.

abilities.name: Rendezvous
abilities.description: Place two teleport anchors. While on the ground and in range of an anchor, reactivate to quickly teleport to the other anchor.

abilities.name: [X] Tour De Force
abilities.description: Summon a powerful, custom sniper rifle that will kill an enemy with any direct hit. Killing an enemy creates a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

characters.name: Neon
characters.description: Filipino Agent Neon surges forward at shocking speeds, discharging bursts of bioelectric radiance as fast as her body generates it. She sprints ahead to catch enemies off guard, then strikes them down quicker than lightning.

abilities.name: Fast Lane
abilities.description: Fire two energy lines forward that rise into walls of static electricity, blocking vision and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Relay Bolt
abilities.description: Instantly throw an energy bolt that bounces once, electrifying the ground below with a concussive blast.

abilities.name: High Gear
abilities.description: Instantly channel Neon’s power for increased speed. When charged, use Alt-Fire to trigger an electric slide.

abilities.name: [X] Overdrive
abilities.description: Unleash Neon’s full power and speed for a short duration. Fire to channel the power into a deadly lightning beam with high movement accuracy.

characters.name: Fade
characters.description: Turkish bounty hunter, Fade, unleashes the power of raw nightmare to seize enemy secrets. Haunting, controlling, and tracking foes with her unique fear-based abilities, she is the one who finds you in the dark.

abilities.name: Prowler
abilities.description: Send out a Prowler that will travel in a straight line, locking onto and chasing any enemies or trails in their frontal vision cone.

abilities.name: Seize
abilities.description: Throw a knot of raw fear that ruptures on impact, tethering, deafening, and decaying caught enemies.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: Throw an orb that plummets and, on hitting the ground, transforms into a nightmarish entity that reveals the location of enemies in its line of sight.

abilities.name: [X] Nightfall
abilities.description: Unleash a wave of nightmare energy that can traverse through walls. The energy creates a trail to the opponent as well as deafens and decays them.

characters.name: Harbor
characters.description: Hailing from India’s coast, Harbor storms the field wielding ancient technology with dominion over water. He unleashes frothing rapids and crushing waves to shield his allies and pummel those that oppose him.

abilities.name: Cascade
abilities.description: Equip a wave of water. Fire to send the wave rolling forward and through walls, slowing players it hits.

abilities.name: Cove
abilities.description: Equip a sphere of shielding water that blocks bullets.

abilities.name: High Tide
abilities.description: Equip a wall of water. Fire to send the water forward. Hold fire to guide the water's path, creating a wall that slows players.

abilities.name: [X] Reckoning
abilities.description: Summon a geyser pool on the ground. Enemy players in the area are targeted by successive geyser strikes that concuss them.

characters.name: Gekko
characters.description: Gekko the Angeleno leads a tight-knit crew of calamitous creatures. His buddies bound forward, scattering enemies out of the way, with Gekko chasing them down to plant or defuse the Spike.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: Throw Mosh like a grenade. After landing, it duplicates across a large area and then explodes after a short delay.

abilities.name: Wingman
abilities.description: Send Wingman forward seeking enemies. If an enemy is found, he unleashes a concussive blast. Alt-Fire to send Wingman to plant or defuse the Spike.

abilities.name: Dizzy
abilities.description: Send Dizzy soaring forward. Dizzy charges and unleashes plasma blasts at enemies in their line of sight, blinding them.

abilities.name: [X] Thrash
abilities.description: Link with Thrash's mind and steer her through enemy territory. Activate to lunge forward and explode, detaining any enemies in a small radius.

characters.name: Deadlock
characters.description: Norwegian operative Deadlock deploys an array of cutting-edge nanowire to secure the battlefield from even the most lethal assault. No one escapes her vigilant watch, or survives her unyielding grip.

abilities.name: GravNet
abilities.description: Throw a grenade that detonates upon landing, forcing any enemies caught within it to crouch and move slowly.

abilities.name: Sonic Sensor
abilities.description: Deploy a sensor that monitors an area for enemies making sound. It concusses that area if significant noise is detected.

abilities.name: Barrier Mesh
abilities.description: Throw a disc forward. Upon landing, the disc generates a barrier that blocks character movement.

abilities.name: [X] Annihilation
abilities.description: Unleash a pulse of nanowires that captures the first enemy contacted. The cocooned enemy is pulled along a nanowire path and will die if they reach the end, unless freed.

characters.name: Iso
characters.description: Chinese fixer for hire, Iso goes into a flow state to dismantle the opposition. Reconfiguring ambient energy into bulletproof protection, he proceeds with focus and lethality, advancing until the job is done.

abilities.name: Undercut
abilities.description: Equip a molecular bolt. Fire to throw it forward, applying a brief 'vulnerable' effect to all players it touches.

abilities.name: Double Tap
abilities.description: Start a focus timer. Once complete, downed enemies you kill or damage generate an energy orb. Shooting this orb grants a shield that absorbs one instance of damage.

abilities.name: Contingency
abilities.description: Assemble a prismatic wall of energy and fire to push it forward. The wall is bulletproof and blocks vision.

abilities.name: [X] Kill Contract
abilities.description: Hurl a column of energy through the battlefield, pulling you and the first enemy hit into a 1v1 arena. The winner leaves the arena, the loser dies.

characters.name: Clove
characters.description: Scottish troublemaker Clove makes mischief for enemies in both the heat of combat and the cold of death. The young immortal keeps foes guessing, even from beyond the grave, as they return to the living.

abilities.name: Pick-Me-Up
abilities.description: Instantly absorb the life force of a fallen enemy that Clove damaged or killed, gaining haste and temporary health.

abilities.name: Meddle
abilities.description: Throw a fragment of immortality essence, which erupts after a short delay and temporarily decays all targets caught inside.

abilities.name: Ruse
abilities.description: Set locations where Clove’s clouds will settle. Confirm to launch clouds that block vision in the chosen areas. Clove can use this ability after death.

abilities.name: [X] Not Dead Yet
abilities.description: After dying, activate to resurrect. Once resurrected, Clove must earn a kill or a damaging assist within a set time or they will die.

abilities.title: Agent Abilities
abilities.subtitle: Master each kit to dominate the match.
